attributes.action: lobby that Lieutenant-Colonel Robert Blair "Paddy" Mayne DSO & 3 Bars should be awarded the Victoria Cross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blair Mayne won 3 Military Bars, The Legion De Honneur, destroyed countless german aircraft some with his bare hands and was the most decorated solider of WW2. I would like to put forward the idea that his efforts in Italy, North Africa, France and Nazi Germany deserve the Victoria Cross which he deserved many times over.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
